title: Rituals and Revelations
outcome: The districts discover a cache of Halden's personal digital confessionals and data fragments, hidden within the Oversight Directorate’s archives. These reveal that Halden saw collapse as inevitable and intentionally sabotaged the BCI to empower citizens. Inspired, communities stage open rituals, publicly recounting lost years and making pledges of transparency. Districts unite in rejecting algorithmic rule, instead formalizing a Federation Charter focused on collective governance and permanent rejection of secret surveillance.

events.description: Archivists recover and decrypt Halden's personal confessionals, revealing he foresaw the BCI's collapse and hid messages urging collective empowerment.
A citywide Ritual of Farewells is held. Testimonies about BCI-era losses are broadcast, uniting districts in shared purpose and grief.
District leaders draft and sign a Federation Charter, abolishing secret archives and algorithmic decision-making in favor of transparent community rule.
Residents vow to keep Halden’s last instructions alive by instituting annual public audits and memory rituals, preserving both wounds and lessons as Stenograd’s new civic foundation.
